themes: dependence on city funding for arts organizations
importance of supporting high-quality, accessible arts experiences
need for equitable and thoughtful fund distribution
role of funding in community building
key_phrases: We would not be able to produce our season without the support from the Elevate Grant
hope other companies who provide high-quality, accessible arts experiences receive vital city funding
funding is provided to organizations that are providing arts to the community in profound ways
finding the right way to administrate the funds is challenging
hope that the way it is distributed is assessed in a thoughtful way that promotes community building, accessibility, and quality experiences
barriers_identified: challenges in administrating and distributing funds
solutions_proposed: assess the way funding is distributed in a thoughtful way that promotes community building, accessibility, and quality experiences
